segments.text: Have you decided what you are going to take next semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm an English major , you know.So I came here to make sure I'm taking the right things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I think it's a good idea . Our department should require meetings like this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to finish my degree in four years.So I don't want to forget to take classes I need . I have a friend who has to stay in college another year.She didn't know until recently . There were some classes she needed to take to graduate.She didn't know about them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that happens .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I brought my transcript from my first year.Here . And here is the list of courses I plan to take in the fall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Good . I see you've already taken six credits of your breadth requirements.You have one botany class and one chemistry class . And political science.So that's nine credits . Did you take English Composition 201 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't need to . I took Advanced Placement English in high school.So I'm not required to take composition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent . I see you have the 18th century poetry class for next semester.And the modern novel class . You haven't taken a Shakespeare class yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I thought I would take it later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I recommend you take Shakespeare sooner rather than later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I suppose I could cross out the 18th century poetry class . I have to see when the Shakespeare class meets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me look at the timetable.Shakespeare meets Monday , Wednesday and Friday at 11
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can take it then . I have that time slot free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I recommend it . Shakespeare is of course enormously important.We want our students to take the class as soon as they can.And Professor Friedman is an excellent teacher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take it then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me , Lisa , what made you decide to be an English major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to be an English professor in the future . I love studying literature , and I want to teach it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? That's great to know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the reason I want to finish my B . A . in four years.Because I know I will be in school a long time . I want to start the M . A . and Ph . D . program as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
